name: slicer
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: the main program which takes in one or two input images and produces as many separate output pictures of slices as are requested. The basic output options (-x, -y and -z) produce single slice pictures. The more advanced options (-a, -A and -S) produce montages of various slices. slicer outputs PPM format pictures

inputs.name: input file
inputs.description: Input volume.

inputs.name: Overlay file
inputs.description: Overlay volume.

inputs.name: Label slices
inputs.description: Label slices with slice number.

inputs.name: Colour map
inputs.description: Use different colour map from that specified in the header.

inputs.name: Scaling
inputs.description: Image scale.

inputs.name: Intensity range
inputs.description: Specify intensity min and max for display range.

inputs.name: Threshold edges
inputs.description: Use specified threshold for edges (if >0 use this proportion of max-min, if <0, use the absolute value)

inputs.name: Dither edges
inputs.description: Produce semi-transparent (dithered) edges.

inputs.name: Nearest neighbour
inputs.description: Use nearest neighbor interpolation for output.

inputs.name: Show orientation
inputs.description: Do not put left-right labels in output

inputs.name: Red dot marker
inputs.description: Add a red dot marker to topright of image.

inputs.name: Output single image
inputs.description: Output mid-sagittal, -coronal, and -axial slices into one image.

inputs.name: Output sagittal slice
inputs.description: Output sagittal slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

inputs.name: Output sagittal slice file name
inputs.description: Output file name sagittal slice.

inputs.name: Output axial slice
inputs.description: Output axial slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

inputs.name: Output axial slice file name
inputs.description: Output file name axial slice.

inputs.name: Output coronal slice
inputs.description: Output coronal slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

inputs.name: Output coronal slice file name
inputs.description: Output file name coronal slice.

inputs.name: Output all axial slices width
inputs.description: Maximum width of image of all axial slices.

inputs.name: Output all axial slices image file name
inputs.description: File name of all axial slice output image.

inputs.name: Output every sample axial slices
inputs.description: Ouput every <sample>'th axial slice.

inputs.name: Output all axial slices image width
inputs.description: Width of every <sample'th> axial slice output image.

inputs.name: Output all axial slices image file name
inputs.description: File name of every <sample'th> axial slice output image.

output-files.name: Single image out file
output-files.description: Output mid-sagittal, -coronal, and -axial slices into one image.

output-files.name: All axial slices image file
output-files.description: File name of every <sample'th> axial slice output image.

groups.name: Arguments for all axial slice image
Arguments for sampleth axial slice image
